itinerary.route: Fly to Lukla; Trek to Phakding
itinerary.mapNote: First overnight after Lukla flight. Dudh Koshi river. 2610m.
Sherpa capital. Horseshoe bowl. Market on Saturdays. 3440m.
Famous monastery on ridge. Ama Dablam views. 3867m.
Imja Khola side valley. Great Lhotse views. 4360m.
Gorak Shep 5140m. EBC 5364m visited same day. Sleep at Gorak Shep.
After Kala Patthar 5545m sunrise. HRA clinic here. 4371m.
Return to Sherpa capital. Last teahouse comforts. 3440m.
Final overnight before flight. Celebrate at Hillary Bar. 2840m.

waypoints.name: Everest Base Camp
waypoints.note: South Base Camp on Khumbu Glacier. Icefall and expedition tents.

waypoints.name: Kala Patthar
waypoints.note: Best Everest pre-dawn view. Highest point on standard EBC trek.

waypoints.name: Tengboche Monastery
waypoints.note: Most famous Khumbu monastery. Ama Dablam backdrop.

waypoints.name: Ama Dablam
waypoints.note: The Matterhorn of the Himalaya. Visible for most of the trek.

waypoints.name: Hillary Suspension Bridge
waypoints.note: One of world's highest suspension bridges. Dudh Koshi River.

waypoints.name: Khumbu Glacier
waypoints.note: Enormous glacier flowing from Everest's Western Cwm.

waypoints.name: Everest Summit
waypoints.note: World's highest peak. Visible from Kala Patthar on clear days.

waypoints.name: Namche Bazaar Saturday Market
waypoints.note: Sherpa capital weekly market. Yaks, equipment, food. Don't miss.
